name: homework-02-chadia12
description: Please find below an Express application that connects to a local MongoDB instance, each document has the following structure for `schools` collection: ```JavaScript {     "_id":1,     "teachers": [         {"_id":1, "name":"Asaad"},         {"_id":2, "name":"Umur"}     ],     "courses":[         {"_id":1, "title": "CS477", "students":[             {"_id":1, "name":"John"},             {"_id":2, "name":"Selin"}         ]},         {"_id":2, "title": "CS571", "students":[             {"_id":1, "name":"Alican"},             {"_id":2, "name":"Dean"}         ]},         {"_id":3, "title": "CS415", "students":[             {"_id":1, "name":"Tina"},             {"_id":2, "name":"Clyde"}         ]}     ] } ``` Your are responsible on writing code for 6 MongoDB queries within 6 pre-defined routes in `app.js` file: 1. Add teacher *(level 1)* 2. Update teacher by ID *(level 1)* 3. Delete teacher by ID *(level 1)* 4. Add a new student to specific course *(level 2)* 5. Update a student's name *(level 2)* 6. Delete a student *(level 2)*
